ValidationRule.description: Give an error message if user try to create a meeting outside of timeline and work trail
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName, "ArbeidsgiverEvent", 1, "IPS_Event", 1, "IPS_UO_Arbeidsgiver", 1, "ips_UO_m_ter", 1, "ips_uo_Deltakermote", 1, 0 )=1, CASE( Owner:User.Profile.Name, "NAV IPS Jobbspesialist",1, "NAV IPS Metodeveileder",1, "NAV UO Jobbspesialist",1, "NAV UO Metodeveileder",1, 0 )=1, IPS_isFromTimeline__c = false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: MÃ¸ter fra kalenderen kan ikke opprettes
